newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Boulares reelected speaker of Tunisia parliament.
newsitem.headline: Boulares reelected speaker of Tunisia parliament.

text.p: Tunisia's parliament on Tuesday reelected Habib Boulares, a liberal figure in Tunisian politics, as its speaker.
Boulares, 63, is a politburo member of the Ruling Constitutional Democratic Rally, which holds 144 of the 163 seats of the Chamber of Deputies.
Boulares was reelected unanimously. He was first elected speaker in 1991.
